articles.title: Explained: What can the US and its allies do to stop Russia from potentially invading Ukraine? - The Indian Express

articles.title: Champions Cup: Bath v Leinster - The Irish Times
articles.description: The four-time winners can cement their place in the last-16 of the European Cup with a win over Bath at The Rec.
